remarks: If a set of vectors is a subset of a subspace, then the span of those vectors is also contained in the subspace.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2014.)
statement:
lspssp.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspssp.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspssp $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S /\ T C_ U ) -> ( N ` T ) C_ U ) $.
